humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, 2 lymph nodes were examined and both were negative for metastatic carcinoma. This information aligns with New Rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that lymph nodes examined are 2 and lymph nodes positive are 0. This means that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes, which corresponds to N0.
